function.name: update_task
function.description: Update an existing task in the Todozi system. Use this to change status, progress, priority, or other task properties.

task_id.description: ID of the task to update. Required - you must know the specific task ID.

status.description: New status for the task. Use 'done' to complete, 'in_progress' to start working.

progress.description: Progress percentage (0-100). Use this to track completion progress.

priority.description: New priority level for the task.

assignee.description: Change who is assigned to handle this task.

context.description: Additional context, notes, or updated requirements for the task.
examples: Actually, this needs to be done by Friday
Blocked by dependency on user management system

examples.description: Update task priority and add context

example.context: Client meeting moved up to tomorrow morning

examples.description: Mark task as blocked with explanation

example.context: Waiting for API documentation from external vendor
